title: "Anti-Brusher" with Ego Nwodim
itunes:title: "Anti-Brusher" with Ego Nwodim
description:
Do ants crawl in your mouth when you're sleeping if you forget to brush your teeth? Langston and his guest Ego Nwodim (Saturday Night Live) try to swallow the truth behind this stunning claim. Also, they draft up a better pitch for a new PETA campaign.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
